title: Groundbreaking Food Gardens (gnv64)
description:
Groundbreaking Food Gardens - 73 Plans That Will Change the Way You Grow Your Garden
by Niki Jabbour
Storey Publishing | March 2014 | ISBN-10: 161212061X | True PDF | 272 pages | 35.9 mb

Vegetable gardens can be designed for flavor AND fun! Niki Jabbour, author of the best-selling The Year-Round Vegetable Gardener, has collected 73 plans for novel and inspiring food gardens from her favorite superstar gardeners, including Amy Stewart, Amanda Thomsen, Barbara Pleasant, Dave DeWitt, and Jessi Bloom. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll find a garden that provides salad greens 52 weeks a year, another that supplies your favorite cocktail ingredients, one that you plant on a balcony, one that encourages pollinators, one that grows 24 kinds of chile peppers, and dozens more. Each plan is fully illustrated and includes a profile of the contributor, the story behind the design, and a plant list.

About the Author
Niki Jabbour is a garden writer and radio show personality. Her work also appears in magazines across North America including Canadian Gardening, Garden Making and Gardens East.
